inclusion.criterion: urinary tract lithiasis (stones ≥ 2cm) or urolithiasis with hydronephrosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: physical examination reveals tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles

inclusion.criterion: urinary tract lithiasis (stones ≥ 2cm) or urolithiasis with hydronephrosis
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: urine culture showed Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts

exclusion.criterion: antimicrobial drugs been administered in the latest month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: immunosuppressor been administered in the latest month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: urinary tract infection or positive urine culture results
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: neuromuscular dysfunction (spina bifida, paraplegia, green Barry syndrome, or quadriplegia)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 25-year-old G1 P1 pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency and frequency. Physical examination reveals tenderness on palpation of both costovertebral angles.
